name: Leather Notebook Cover - Brown
description:
Our notebook cover is hand cut from high quality vegetable tanned leather, hand stitched with the traditional, distinctive and long lasting saddle stitch, and then hand finished.  The notebook cover has a slip for a pen (Shown here with the classic Parker jotter), two spaces for business cards or plastic, and a pocket behind these for larger items.  When closed, the cover is held securely with a brass stud.

Shown here with the Moleskine Cahier notepad, which measures 14x9cm; will also accept the Fieldnotes notepad of the same size.

The pen and Moleskine notepad are available for purchase separately.

name: Key hanger
description:
Our leather key hanger is hand made and finished using sturdy vegetable tanned leather, and will keep your keys safe and secure.  The strap loops around a maximum belt width of 2", and closes securely with a stud fastener.

It features a brass snap hook for a quick key release.

The key hanger is around 5.5" in length including hardware.
